title: carabean Vacation
comment: A beautiful Condo, on the beach, overlooking the ocean. Seasonal dolphin migration is witnessed virually every morning during the late fall period.

title: Mexico City Delight
comment: Explore Mexico City from the top and explore its realms from within. A beautiful vacation for the 'In Loved'. Explore the beauty of Mexico city in comfort.

title: Canadian-vacation, high above
comment: Enjoy Maple-syrop, special beakfast, call a moose and explore the clean and the natural realm of the famous Lake Louise, Alberta. Lodge 10 minutes away from an amazing and worldly view. On the way back, witness moose and elk on the road, roaming-around with no-worries, all within the wonderful world of Canada.

title: Quite,peaceful and tranquil for the thinkers
comment: Enjoy true quiet and tranquility, while sharing the soft soft sounds of nature, northern Quebec, 5 minutes from Mont-Tremblay. In, summer, have a dip in your own private lake, pick your berries and mushroom from just a minute away, by foot. In the winter, explore the third tallest mountain in the Eastern part of North America - 30 minutes drive.
